ISSUE.TITLE: Add boolean "StopProcessing" property to events
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If it's set to "true" in an event handler, then ignore other event handlers. It'll also allow to return custom values (e.g. product price) instead of the default implementation We also need a list of such new events added (e.g. price calculation events, etc) Related forum source - https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/47932/feature-request-before-events-such-as-beforeorderplacedevent#189847 Related work item https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/2436

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1020 Implement IStopProcessingEvent interface for GenericRoutingEvent instead of using Handled property
